Html:
Hi.

My Motherlanguage is German, i understand not so good English.

I have set up Rate It on my Website. I want let rate my Maps for the Game Unreal Tournament 2004.

The Rating was displayed at my Page, but if i rate, the Data was not saved. What i must do, that the Data become saved?

Here the Example at the bottom of the Page :

http://anton-gremaud.square7.ch/?leveldesign.html

Greetings.
RateIt is a client side component, in order to save the info you'll need to build some server side component, that will receive the info and save it somehow.
